summary: Music is the arrangement of sounds to create harmony, melody, and rhythm. It's found in all human societies and can express many emotions. Music is made through composition, improvisation, and performance using instruments or voices. It plays a big role in social events, religion, and media like movies and video games. People enjoy listening to music for fun, and it's also studied in many fields. The music industry includes musicians, producers, and engineers who create and distribute music using technology like MP3 players and smartphones.
title: Music
